title: Edit a component type
content:
If a component type belongs to a locked palette or is a locked system critical object, you can't edit it. In these cases, the Edit button in the Overview tab becomes disabled.

To edit a component type

  1. In the left pane of the Components area, select the component palette that contains the component type you want to edit.
  2. Click the component type you want to edit.
  3. In the Overview tab, click the gear icon and select Edit.
  4. Edit the details of the component type. For descriptions of the specific fields, see the topic Create a component type.

  5. Click Save.

    The following fields aren't editable:

    • Name - for all Components
    • CI Type - for a CI Type Component

Related topics

  • Create a component type
